dct_description_sm: [1705], in Dutch and French. California with indented northern coastline.

California with northern coastline sloping up to east. Few place names on island: C. Blanco, C. Mendocino, C. de Pinos, C. de S. Lucas. Terre de Iesso to northwest. Great Lakes open-ended to west. Title cartouche of scrollwork (upper left). Engraved by: A. d'Winter sculp (lower left).Nearly identical with 1657 map of same title, engraved by A. Peyrounin (Entry 18).
LC 494; Wheat 51 (State 2); Leighly 29; BN Sanson II F(1); UCB (State 2); Nordenski√∂ld 3, 713(13) and 3, 359(3); Burden 324 (Plate 324).
Issued in: Algeemeene Weereld-Beschreibung ... / Pherotee De La Croix. -- Amsterdam : Francois Halma, 1705.
Door N. Sanson d'Abbeville Geographe du Roy
